name: Yeet to Meet
description:
A hard platformer where you have to YEET yourself in order to maneuver.

A game I made in around 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. This was my very first game jam everrrr. Despite how the game turned out I'm really happy that I got to participate and finish my game.

The game itself, is quite fun (and frustrating) to play. Keep in mind it is kinda hard and therefore, might cause rage.

PS: I was constantly fighting off the urge to put the 'YEET!' sound as the sound effect for every time you Yeet xD.

#BrackeysGameJam
